name: Unknown (Development) 0.01
description:
For Unknown I got inspired by a little console engine called pico 8 so I wanted to make in that style these are only the first 2 levels so don't really expect something out of the ordinary 

Hope you guys have fun playing it 

P.S.

Before you play um there is no music I forgot to make some just know that this is a prototype but yeah uh new build with music coming soon 😅

Controls?

Move with A/D-Left/Right , and jump with spacebar

Quitting?

Press ESC

Reset Level?

Press R
